name: Wacky Waiter
description:
Made for the Wowie Jam 3.0 - Failure is progress!

You play as waiter in a restaurant and you can check what the customers want and deliver it, and if you do well, the game slowly becomes more difficult!

Or you can screw up as much as you want and get fired! Don't worry, there will always be a new place for you to work at: rundown restaurants, volunteer kitchens, a circus and you might even work for the man with horns himself!
